page.title: 07A day in my life.
page.content: On Saturday I wake up at{nine {oclock}and I get dressed. Then I go downstairs and make my{breakfast.}I have fruit juice and a biscuit.Then I {watch}The Saturday Picture Show on television. At ten oclock I{go shopping}with my family. We sometimes go on the bus but mostly we walk. We go to the {market}first and have a good look round. Then we walk down the big hill and go to{British Home Stores. Sometimes my mum buys a drink for my brothers and me from there. My brothers usually go to{Toy and {Hobby}whilst my mum and I go to{Marks {and Spencers. My mum tells my brothers to come back to meet us at Marks.After twenty minutes the boys return and we go to {Tesco.}When we have finished we get a taxi home.
